property.name: navigationDevName
property.label: Navigation name
property.description: Pick the target nav when mode is set to Experience Cloud Navigation.

property.name: ipName
property.label: Integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this header nav.

property.name: inputJSON
property.label: Input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure.

property.name: optionsJSON
property.label: Options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure.

property.name: primaryLogo
property.label: Primary Logo
property.description: A JSON { src, alt, url }. Leave src empty to get standard logo, and url empty to target community home.

property.name: secondaryLogo
property.label: Secondary logo
property.description: A JSON { src, alt, url }. Leave empty if a secondary logo is not required.

property.name: showSearch
property.label: Show search
property.description: Set to show an input field for users to initiate a search.

property.name: showQuickExit
property.label: Show quick exit
property.description: Set to show the quick exit button.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
